content.p: This document explains how to run DGEE once it has been installed either by building it from the source distribution or from a binary package.
content.pre:
RUNNING THE DGEE ----------------
Booting -------
Once the environment has been set up by sourcing dgeeenv.sh the application may be started.
DGEE should generally be started before Apache, as mod_dgee needs the DGEE application to bind to.
Step 1. Start an instance of the Goldwater middleware for the DGEE and boot the DGEE server processes
